DOCNAME: CASE OF ILCHYSHYN AND OTHERS v. UKRAINE
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants are NORP nationals residing in GPE .

CARDINAL . By a judgment of CARDINAL DATE ORG awarded the fourth applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) in compensation for various work - related payments and teachers ' benefits due to him LAW CARDINAL § § TIME ) and CARDINAL ) of LAW and legal costs to be paid by ORG .

CARDINAL . By separate judgments of CARDINAL September CARDINAL ORG awarded the first applicant ORG DATE , the second applicant ORG DATE , the third applicant ORG MONEY , the fifth applicant ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL , the sixth applicant ORG CARDINAL.CARDINAL , and the seventh applicant ORG CARDINAL in compensation for similar payments and teachers ' benefits as above .

CARDINAL . The judgments became final and enforceable . Parts of the judgment debts were paid to the first , third , fourth , fifth , sixth and seventh applicants during DATE . The judgments were enforced in full on DATE .

CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice are summarised in the judgments of PERSON v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE ) , ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) , and Skrypnyak and Others v. GPE ( nos . GPE , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL/CARDINAL , DATE and CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
